name: CVE-2020-0554
description: Race condition in software installer for some Intel(R) Wireless Bluetooth(R) products on Windows* 7, 8.1 and 10 may allow an unprivileged user to potentially enable escalation of privilege via local access.
pattern: [((software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:intel:ax200_firmware:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:intel:ac_9560_firmware:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:intel:ac_9462_firmware:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:intel:ac_9461_firmware:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:intel:ac_9260_firmware:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:intel:ac_8265_firmware:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:intel:ac_8260_firmware:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:intel:ac_3168_firmware:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:intel:ac_7265_firmware:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:intel:ac_3165_firmware:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:intel:ax201_firmware:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*') AND (software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_10:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*')) OR ((software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:intel:ax200_firmware:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:intel:ac_9560_firmware:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:intel:ac_9462_firmware:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:intel:ac_9461_firmware:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:intel:ac_9260_firmware:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:intel:ac_8265_firmware:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:intel:ac_8260_firmware:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:intel:ac_3168_firmware:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:intel:ac_7265_firmware:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:intel:ac_3165_firmware:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:intel:ax201_firmware:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*') AND (software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_8.1:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_7:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*'))]
